pages.text: The Rite of $(marked)Hysteria$() is a essential Rite to most Entheators.$(br)It is usually cast as a $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro#triggered_rite)$(t:->Triggered Rites)$(marked)triggered Rite$(), and invokes a strong $(marked)Mania$() in anyone near it, commonly used as a precedent for other Rites.
Definitely make sure to cast this while sneaking to not accidentally start it normally.
